trends: There have been no other sightings in bitely
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: raining and cloudy and we saw a star like light flying in the sky, no other flight lights
divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i were driving southbound on m-37 at 7:40 in the morning , it was rainy and dark . the sky opened up from the tree line and i pointed to a light in the sky,traveling very fast then taking a sharp left turn heading east . we followed the light, which was just a single star like bright white light , traveling east until we saw what appeared to be an airplane with red and green lights appear from the approximate place where we lost sight of the first single light. i mentioned that it must be what we saw but we both agreed that it was two separate crafts, as we live near a small county rural airport. the space station was supposed to be viewable that morning , but it was rainy and cloudy, so it wasnt the space station under the cloud deck. this is not the first experience my wife and i have had and also my son has witnessed several sightings in this area. we have even been contacted sfter shining a laser pointer towards the night sky one evening we flashed the laser twice, and recieved two flashes back from the night sky.... amamzing..... there has been others , please feel free to contact me. thanks for listening. (name moved to fi box) cms 10\25\11 10:30 cst flg
